remarks: The absolute value of an integrable function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
statement:
iblabs.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
iblabs.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblabs $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( abs ` B ) ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
